item.title: Zakir Hussain, legendary Indian tabla musician, dies aged 73 - The Guardian
item.description:
Zakir Hussain, Legendary Indian Tabla Musician, Dies Aged 73

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Zakir Hussain, one of India‚Äôs most accomplished classical musicians who defied genres, has passed away at the age of 73.

  • He died from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis at a hospital in San Francisco on Sunday.
  • Hussain was known as one of the greatest tabla players of his generation, with a career spanning six decades.
  • His collaborations included notable artists like George Harrison and Yo-Yo Ma.
  • He formed the Indian jazz fusion band Shakti in 1973.
  • In 2024, Hussain won three Grammy awards in one year.
  • He received the Padma Vibhushan, India‚Äôs second-highest civilian award, in 2023.
‚ÄúHis prolific work as a teacher, mentor and educator has left an indelible mark on countless musicians.‚Äù

Zakir Hussain‚Äôs legacy as a cultural ambassador and musician will remain unparalleled.

item.title: ‚ÄòSonam 2.0, not Alia 2.0‚Äô: Ananya Panday trolled for saying people take her seriously after CTRL, Call Me Bae - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ananya Panday Faces Trolls After Claiming People Take Her Seriously

Publication Date: Dec 16, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Ananya Panday is under scrutiny after claiming in an interview that people are starting to take her seriously as an actor following her recent works, notably her web series Call Me Bae and the film CTRL.

  • Ananya believes that her performances in recent OTT releases have gained her credibility.
  • She portrays a hustler heiress in Call Me Bae and an influencer in CTRL.
  • Despite her confidence, she faces trolling on social media about her statement.
  • Some online comments mock her claims, calling her 'Sonam 2.0'.
  • However, she also received support from fans praising her performances in her recent projects.
‚ÄúShe is in her delusional era,‚Äù commented a user on social media.

The reaction to Ananya's statement showcases the mixed perceptions of her acting career and the ongoing debate about nepotism in Bollywood.

item.title: TM Krishna Shall Not Be Recognized As Recipient Of Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi Award : Supreme... - Live Law - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Supreme Court Rules Against TM Krishna's Recognition for Sangita Kalanidhi Award

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: LiveLaw

The Supreme Court has issued an interim order preventing Carnatic musician TM Krishna from being recognized as the recipient of the Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi award.

  • The interim order restrains Krishna from presenting himself as the award's recipient following its conferment on December 15, 2024.
  • This order stems from a petition filed by the grandson of MS Subbulakshmi.
  • The Court emphasized the respect associated with MS Subbulakshmi and asked Krishna to refrain from using her name in connection with the award.
  • Amidst arguments, it was asserted that TM Krishna made offensive remarks about Subbulakshmi that were incompatible with receiving an award in her name.
‚ÄúAs the award has been already awarded... we deem it appropriate to say that defendant no.4(TM Krishna) should not be recognised...‚Äù

Justice Bhatti noted the sensitive nature of the case, indicating that until the matter is resolved, Krishna cannot claim the award.

item.title: BREAKING |TM Krishna Shall Not Be Recognized As Recipient Of Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi Award :... - Live Law - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Supreme Court Halts Recognition of TM Krishna for Sangita Kalanidhi Award

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: LiveLaw

The Supreme Court issued an interim order preventing Carnatic musician TM Krishna from being recognized as the recipient of the Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi award, following a petition from the awardee's descendants.

  • The Supreme Court's interim order came after a petition challenged the earlier decision by the Madras High Court to grant the award to TM Krishna.
  • The order stops Krishna from presenting himself as the award recipient.
  • The court emphasized respect for the legacy of MS Subbulakshmi and suggested that TM Krishna‚Äôs previous comments might not befit the honor associated with her name.
  • Amidst arguments, it was asserted that awarding the prize to Krishna would tarnish the reputation of the award and its historical significance.
Justice Bhatti stated, "Till we are clear, awardee cannot have the award in the name of person who he is stated to have disrespected."

This case highlights ongoing tensions around cultural representations and respect for artistic legacies.

item.title: Katrina Kaif spotted seeking blessings at Shirdi Sai Baba Temple - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Katrina Kaif Spotted Seeking Blessings at Shirdi Sai Baba Temple

Publication Date: Not specified in the article

Source: Times of India

Katrina Kaif was recently spotted at the Mumbai airport before heading to Shirdi to offer prayers. She showcased her love for traditional attire with a stunning yellow ethnic suit and engaged fully in her prayers at the temple.

  • Katrina was seen in an elegant outfit featuring floral embroidery.
  • She was polite and cheerful while interacting with paparazzi, smiling and waving.
  • The actress celebrated her third wedding anniversary with Vicky Kaushal.
  • Katrina shared glimpses of their anniversary trip in Rajasthan.
  • Fans are eagerly awaiting news about her upcoming film 'Jee Le Zaraa'.
‚Äú48 hrs in the jungle,‚Äù Katrina shared on Instagram regarding her anniversary getaway.

The event highlights Katrina's connection with her cultural roots, as she seeks blessings at one of the most revered shrines in India.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' tops list of second weekend highest grossing movies with Rs 100 crore just in Hindi; followed by 'Stree 2', 'Gadar 2', 'Animal' and 'Baahubali 2' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' Breaks Box Office Records in Second Weekend Grossing Rs 100 Crore in Hindi

Publication Date: December 5, 2023
Source: Times of India

'Pushpa 2' is making headlines as it sets a new record at the box office, grossing Rs 100 crore in its second weekend from the Hindi version alone, amidst controversies surrounding its lead actor.

  • 'Pushpa 2' grossed Rs 63.3 crore on Saturday, showing a growth of around 73% from Friday.
  • On Sunday, it made Rs 76 crore, with Rs 54 crore coming from the Hindi version.
  • The film is projected to cross Rs 1000 crore net in India across all languages.
  • Other top contenders in the second weekend include 'Stree 2' with Rs 93 crore, 'Gadar 2' with Rs 89 crore, and 'Animal' with Rs 88 crore.
'Pushpa 2' now tops the list of the highest-grossing second weekend movies.

The success of 'Pushpa 2' highlights its popularity and the strong connection it has established with the audience.

item.title: "Write Panjab Or Punjab...": Diljit Dosanjh Reacts To Spelling Controversy - NDTV
item.description:
'Write Panjab Or Punjab...': Diljit Dosanjh Reacts To Spelling Controversy

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: NDTV

A social media post by Punjabi singer and actor Diljit Dosanjh has sparked a 'Punjab vs Panjab' debate after he shared a video captioned with 'Panjab', leading to allegations about his loyalty.

  • Diljit shared a video upon arriving at Chandigarh airport, using the term 'Panjab'.
  • Social media users suggested he was promoting a Pakistani identity by this spelling.
  • In response, Diljit called the accusations 'conspiracy theories'.
  • He emphasized that spelling differences do not affect Punjab's identity.
‚ÄúIf Punjab is written as Panjab, it's called a conspiracy... Whether you write it as Panjab or Punjab... it will always remain Punjab.‚Äù ‚Äî DILJIT DOSANJH

The debate reflects deeper historical and cultural tensions between India and Pakistan regarding the Punjab region's identity.

item.title: Vivian Dsena's wife Nouran Aly reacts on calling Karan Veer Mehra 'junior artist': 'Mujhe farak..' - India Forums
item.description:
Nouran Aly Defends Vivian Dsena Against Karan Veer Mehra's Remarks on Bigg Boss 18

Published: Monday, June 15, 1446 at 8:42 AM | Source: India Forums

Nouran Aly, wife of television actor Vivian Dsena, made headlines after her recent appearance on Bigg Boss 18, where she addressed the controversy surrounding remarks made by Karan Veer Mehra.

  • Karan Veer Mehra allegedly called Vivian a "junior artist" and said he invited him to parties to fill space.
  • Nouran clarified her stance on social media, stating that her words were manipulated and emphasized her indifference to hate comments.
  • She stated, "Who called the other junior artist? Manipulating or twisting my statement won't work on me. Hate comments and fake narratives don't affect me‚Äîmujhe fark nahi padta."
  • Her bold defense has rallied support from fans, reinforcing Vivian's position in the show.

Fans are excitedly labeling this as Vivian's "comeback era" on the show, anticipating his potential victory in Bigg Boss 18.

item.title: Controversy after Ilaiyaraaja faces sanctum entry restrictions, temple cites protocol - The Indian Express
item.description:
Controversy after Ilaiyaraaja faces sanctum entry restrictions, temple cites protocol

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: The Indian Express

Renowned music composer Ilaiyaraaja's recent visit to the Srivilliputhur Andal Temple stirred controversy after he was denied access to the sanctum, with officials citing protocol.

  • Ilaiyaraaja was accompanied by prominent religious figures during his visit to the temple.
  • He paid his respects from outside the restricted areas, adhering to temple protocols that apply to all devotees.
  • Post-visit, he was honored with garlands and attended a cultural event celebrating the launch of his album 'Divya Pasuram'.
  • Videos circulated on social media suggesting a denial of entry led to public interpretations connected to his caste identity, sparking criticism.
  • Temple authorities maintained that the restrictions are standard and not based on caste factors.
‚ÄúThe temple administration gave him full honours.‚Äù - Sri Sadagopa Ramanuja Jeeyar Swamigal

Overall, the incident has raised questions about temple protocols and their application in sensitive situations, particularly concerning caste dynamics.

item.title: Fans exchange blows, launch cans at each other in VIP lounge of Karan Aujla's concert in Gurugram. Watch videos - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Violence Erupts at Karan Aujla's Concert in Gurugram

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Karan Aujla's concert on December 15 in Gurugram, attended by over 12,000 people, turned chaotic as fights broke out among attendees, casting a shadow over the event.

  • Concert attracted a large crowd with special appearances by rapper Badshah and actor Varun Dhawan.
  • Multiple videos show violent altercations among concertgoers, especially in the VIP lounge.
  • Backlash on social media regarding security arrangements at the venue.
  • Karan Aujla performed for two hours including hits like 'Tauba Tauba' and 'Making Memories'.
‚ÄúThank you Gurugram! Tonight was pure fire energy!‚Äù - Karan Aujla

The incident raises concerns over safety at large events and highlights the need for better security measures at concerts.

item.title: Malaika Arora recalls mom was called to her college over poor attendance: 'I started doing a few ads, shows' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Malaika Arora recalls mom was called to her college over poor attendance: 'I started doing a few ads, shows'

Date: Dec 16, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Malaika Arora began her modelling career while in college, motivated by a desire for independence. However, her journey faced challenges, including poor attendance that led her college to contact her mother.

  • Malaika reflects on how her college attendance issues prompted her mother to receive calls from the institution.
  • She started modelling to contribute to her family as her mother was a single parent.
  • Malaika emphasizes her desire for independence rather than fame in her career pursuits.
  • Her parents separated when she was young, leading her to develop a close bond with her mother.
‚ÄúI want to be independent. I needed to do something which gave me some sort of value.‚Äù - Malaika Arora

Malaika's story illustrates the challenges and motivations behind her early career choices and reflects on her supportive family dynamics.

item.title: Atlee schools Kapil Sharma for trolling his looks, asks him not to make fun of Archana Puran Singh: ‚ÄòJudge by heart, not appearance‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Atlee Schools Kapil Sharma for Trolling His Looks

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Indian Express

During a recent episode of The Great Indian Kapil Show, comedian Kapil Sharma made a joke regarding Atlee Kumar's appearance, which prompted the director to respond thoughtfully about judging others by their character rather than their looks.

  • Kapil Sharma teased Atlee about his looks during the show.
  • Atlee responded by emphasizing that success is based on talent, not appearance.
  • He mentioned being grateful to AR Murugadoss for recognizing his potential based on his work rather than his looks.
  • Atlee defended Archana Puran Singh, calling her the 'saviour' of the show and asked Kapil not to make fun of her.
  • The episode has gone viral, with many criticizing Kapil's remarks.
  • Atlee is currently co-producing Baby John, an adaptation of his film Theri, set to release on December 25.
‚ÄúYou have to judge by your heart.‚Äù ‚Äì Atlee Kumar

This incident highlights the importance of looking beyond physical appearances and valuing individuals for their contributions and character.

item.title: Diljit Dosanjh announces he won't do shows in India until this happens - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Diljit Dosanjh won't perform in India until concert infrastructure improves

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent announcement during his Chandigarh concert, singer Diljit Dosanjh revealed that he will not hold concerts in India until the country's concert infrastructure is properly developed.

  • Diljit made the announcement during a show in Chandigarh on December 14, 2024.
  • He emphasized the lack of infrastructure for live shows, which he sees as a significant source of revenue and employment.
  • During the concert, he dedicated his performance to India's FIDE World Champion, Gukesh Dommaraju.
  • Prior to the show, an advisory from the Chandigarh Commission for Protection of Child Rights urged Diljit to avoid alcohol-themed songs.
  • His upcoming show in Guwahati on December 29 will conclude his tour in India.
‚ÄúHere we don't have infrastructure for live shows. This is a source of big revenue, many people get work and are able to work here...I'll try next time that the stage is at the centre so that you can be around it. Till this happens, I won't do shows in India, that's for sure.‚Äù

Until improvements are made, Diljit remains firm on his decision not to perform in India, illustrating the need for better concert facilities to enhance the live music experience.

item.description:
Kannappa: Mohanlal is introduced as Kirata

Published on Dec 16, 2024

Kannappa is the ambitious dream project of Tollywood actor Vishnu Manchu, set to release on April 25, 2025. Directed by Mukesh Kumar Singh, this multilingual epic promises to be a visual treat.

  • The film features a stellar cast including Mohan Babu, Sarath Kumar, and Prabhas.
  • Mohanlal plays Kirata, a legendary guardian with a captivating look.
  • The music is composed by Stephen Devassy and Mani Sharma.
  • Character posters are being released weekly as part of the promotion.
‚ÄúThis powerful role of Kirata has captivated audiences, building anticipation.‚Äù

Stay tuned for more updates on this extraordinary venture.

item.description:
Sikandar Teaser Set to Release on Salman Khan's Birthday

Publication Date: Not Specified | Source: Bollywood Hungama

The excitement for Sajid Nadiadwala's upcoming film Sikandar, starring Salman Khan, continues to build as the teaser's release date is announced for December 27, 2024, coinciding with Salman Khan's birthday.

  • The teaser for the highly anticipated film Sikandar will be released on Salman Khan's birthday.
  • This announcement has intensified the excitement among Salman Khan's vast fanbase.
    • promises to be an action-packed entertainer set for release during Eid 2025.
‚ÄúThe teaser will serve as a special birthday gift for Salman Khan's fans.‚Äù

With the teaser release, fans are promised a glimpse of what to expect in this major cinematic project.

item.title: Zakir Hussain: Legendary tabla player dies at 73 - BBC.com
item.description:
Zakir Hussain: Legendary Tabla Player Dies at 73

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: News Agency

Zakir Hussain, one of the world's greatest tabla players, has died at the age of 73 due to idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.

  • Hussain was a four-time Grammy award winner and received the Padma Vibhushan.
  • He transformed the tabla into a globally loved solo instrument.
  • Tributes have started pouring in following his death.
  • Nayan Ghosh described him as a pathbreaker and an icon who elevated tabla on the world stage.
‚ÄúHe was a pathbreaker, a game-changer, an icon who put tabla and Indian music on the world map...‚Äù - Nayan Ghosh

This legendary musician, born in Mumbai in 1951, has left an indelible mark on classical music.

item.title: Mushtaq Khan abduction: NCR gang involved in kidnapping film stars targeted Shakti Kapoor - The Times of India
item.description:
Mushtaq Khan abduction: NCR gang involved in kidnapping film stars targeted Shakti Kapoor

Date: [Insert Date Here] | Source: Times of India

A gang was arrested for abducting actor Mushtaq Khan at the Delhi airport and attempting to extort money in Uttar Pradesh. Reports suggest they also targeted other film stars including Shakti Kapoor.

  • A gang of four was arrested in connection with the kidnapping.
  • The gang allegedly planned to abduct multiple film stars.
  • Mushtaq Khan was held for ransom in Uttar Pradesh.
  • Shakti Kapoor was also a potential target of the kidnappers.
‚ÄúWe are treating this case seriously and will step up security for public figures,‚Äù said a police spokesperson.

The incident highlights increasing concerns over the safety of celebrities and the potential dangers they face from criminal groups.

item.title: Bigg Boss 8 Telugu: Fans of Gautam cry foul on makers - 123telugu
item.description:
Bigg Boss 8 Telugu: Fans of Gautam cry foul on makers

Published on: Dec 16, 2024 10:01 am IST

Bigg Boss 8 Telugu has reached its conclusion, with Nikhil Maliyakkal emerging as the winner amidst controversy from fans of runner-up Gautam Krishna.

  • Nikhil Maliyakkal wins Bigg Boss 8 Telugu.
  • Gautam Krishna was the runner-up and entered as a wild card contestant.
  • Fans accuse the show makers of favoritism towards Nikhil due to his connections with the channel.
  • The audience showed a regional preference for Gautam, who is a Telugu native.
  • Gautam joined six weeks late, which impacted his competition.
‚ÄúFans are upset over the results, claiming Gautam should have won.‚Äù

The fan reaction seems to indicate a deep divide and dissatisfaction with the show‚Äôs outcome, raising questions about the fairness of the voting process.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 11: Allu Arjun film earns Rs 1322 cr, highest earner ever after Dangal and Baahubali 2 - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 11

Date: December 15, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

The film Pushpa 2: The Rule, starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, has shattered box office records, achieving a total worldwide collection of Rs 1322 crore by its 11th day of release.

  • Earned Rs 100 crore on the 11th day.
  • Total Indian collection (all languages) now stands at Rs 900.5 crores.
  • Massive spike of 73.90% in box office collections on the second Saturday.
  • Hindi version grossed Rs 55 crores on December 15.
  • Film surpassed RRR's record, although it's yet to exceed Baahubali 2 and Dangal.
‚Äú#Pushpa2TheRule crosses Massive 1292 CRORES GROSS in 10 days üí•üí•‚Äù

This phenomenal success is attributed to strong word of mouth and high occupancy rates across various regions, particularly in Hyderabad and Vijayawada.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh-Antony Thattil white wedding pictures: Couple starts its happily ever after with a kiss - The Indian Express
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh and Antony Thattil Celebrate Their White Wedding

Publication Date: December 15, 2024 Source: Indian Express

The National Award-winning actor Keerthy Suresh married her longtime boyfriend and entrepreneur Antony Thattil on December 12 in Goa. The couple exchanged vows again in a white wedding on December 15, sharing joyous moments online.

  • Keerthy shared the photos with a special hashtag, ‚Äú#ForTheLoveOfNyke‚Äù, celebrating both their love and her dog, Nyke.
  • The couple had a traditional South Indian wedding before their white wedding ceremony.
  • Keerthy walked down the aisle accompanied by her father and her pet dog Nyke.
  • The couple was spotted celebrating on the dance floor after the vows.
  • Celebrity guests included Thalapathy Vijay, Trisha Krishnan, and Atlee, among others.
‚ÄúSo beautiful,‚Äù commented Varun Dhawan on the wedding photos shared by Keerthy.

This marriage marks a significant relationship milestone after a 15-year courtship, surprising many fans who were unaware of her private life details.

The ceremony reflects a blend of personal happiness and cultural tradition, showcasing the joy of love and community celebration.
